ESP.ORIGINAL:
ScriptName NVDLC02MojaveDoorSCRIPT
; Script to handle transition back to Mojave Wasteland. ; JSH 11.04.10 ; OMP 01/20/2011 - Start the Ending Slide sequence if NVDLC02MQ06 is running; moved the SetStage call for NVDLC02MQ06 inside NVDLC02NarratorSCRIPT; gussied up the script a bit. ; OMP 01/21/2011 - Added code to advance the time when we use the door. ; OMP 01/24/2011 - Added call to stop NVDLC02MQ07. ; DM 1/26/11 - Added fail stage for MS02 if the player leaves before the quest has been completed. ; ETB 02/09/2011 - Added "NV Quests Restart" section below to restart quests that were stopped at the beginning of DLC02. ; OMP 02/21/2011 - Moved the GameMode code block into NVDLC02IntroSlidesSCRIPT to handle disabling the radio going into DLC02 the first time.
Ref rVCountryRadio; ; Variable to hold ref of NV's country radio. Short bNVRadiosOff; ; Control variable. Short bActivateDoor; ; Used to determine whether we want to activate the door or not. Short bNVQuestsRestarted ; Used as a "do once" variable for restarting NV quests that were stopped in script: "NVDLC02MQ00SCRIPT"
BEGIN OnActivate
If IsActionRef Player == 0 Return endif
if p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap == 0 ShowMessage NVDLC02NoMapMsg ElseIf GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ04 == 1 || GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ05 == 1 ShowMessage p20ZionTrailNoGoingBackMsg Else If ( bNVRadiosOff == 1 ) ;RNVTARef.SetBroadcastState 1 RNVTARef.Enable RadioBlackMountainTAREF.Enable Set rVCountryRadio To NVDLC02CountryRadioMarkerREF.GetLinkedREF ;rVCountryRadio.SetBroadcastState 1 rVCountryRadio.Enable Set bNVRadiosOff To 0 EndIf
If GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ06 StartQuest NVDLC02Ending ElseIf GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ07 SetStage NVDLC02MQ07 100 CompleteQuest NVDLC02MQ07 StopQuest NVDLC02MQ07
Set bActivateDoor To 1 Else Set bActivateDoor To 1 EndIf
If GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MS02 SetStage NVDLC02MS02 255 Endif
If bActivateDoor == 1 ; Are we activating the door? ;sets date for arrival
if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 0 endif SetGameHour 336 if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 1 endif
if NVDLC02FollowersQuest.bFollowsChalkHired NVDLC02FireTriggerREF.Activate NVDLC02FollowsChalkREF 1 endif if NVDLC02FollowersQuest.bWakingCloudHired NVDLC02FireTriggerREF.Activate NVDLC02WakingCloudREF 1 endif
Activate EndIf ; -------------------------------- NV Quests Restart ---------------------------------- \/ ; 2/9/11 ETB - Shutting down all NCR/Legion Assassin's quests (Legion "Bad2" one was causing a framerate issue). If bNVQuestsRestarted == 0 If GetStage VEFR01LegionGood2CaesarsFavor < 255 StartQuest VEFR01LegionGood2CaesarsFavor EndIf If GetStage VEFR00LegionMix2CaesarsHire < 255 StartQuest VEFR00LegionMix2CaesarsHire EndIf ; These quest were stopped in script: "NVDLC02MQ00SCRIPT" StartQuest VEFR02LegionBad2CaesarsFoe
;StartQuest VEFR01NCRGood2EmergencyRadio ; [NOTE: This quest is NOT restarted (i.e. commented-out) on purpose (but included for tracking).] StartQuest VEFR00NCRMixed2LimitedAccess StartQuest VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted Set bNVQuestsRestarted to 1 Set NVDLC02MQ00.bNVQuestsDisabled to 0 StopQuest NVDLC02RainQuest Endif ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /\
EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC02ZionMAPSCRIPT
; Script associated to the NVDLC02ZionMap item ; JS(?) 2010 ; OMP 01/18/2011 - Updated to trigger the Ending Slide sequence. ; OMP 01/20/2011 - Removed call to start the Ending Slide sequence; it's being moved to NVDLC02MojaveDoorSCRIPT.
BEGIN OnAdd Player
If ( GetStage NVDLC02MQ07 < 10 ) && ( GetStage NVDLC02MQ06 == 10 )
SetObjectiveCompleted NVDLC02MQ06 10 1; SetObjectiveDisplayed NVDLC02MQ06 15 1;
EndIf
set p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap to 1
END

SCN NVDLC02NorthernPassageDoorSCRIPT
; TLS 01/19/2011 - Script to keep monsters from chasing the player into the northern passage and killing Jed & Co.
ref Actor Short bDoOnce
BEGIN OnActivate
set Actor to GetActionREF if (Actor.GetInFaction PlayerFaction) If (bDoOnce == 0) Set bDoOnce to 1; ;NVDLC02GuardAFREF.SetGhost 1 ;NVDLC02GuardCMREF.SetGhost 1 ;NVDLC02JedREF.SetGhost 1 ;NVDLC02RickyREF.SetGhost 1 ;NVDLC02StellaREF.SetGhost 1 EndIf
if (GetStage NVDLC02MQ00 < 100) ;DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 endif Activate; Else;if (Actor.GetInFaction FollowerFaction) Activate; endif
END

scn NVDLC04WeapGrenadeFlashBangEffectSCRIPT
; Does fatigue damage to targets in the area and temporarily cripples their combat skills. ; JSH 02/08/11 ; CES 07/08/11 - Removed the moding of the weapon stats here and does it on the grenade so the effects are displayed correctly.
Short nDamage ; Amount of fatigue damage the flash bang does, randomly generated. Short nRandom ; A randomly generated number, used to determine if flash bang drives tunneler into a frenzy.
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
If GetDead == 0 && GetIsCreatureType 6 == 0 && GetSelf != Player ; Generate between 25 to 100 points of fatigue damage. Set nDamage to 25 + ( 0.75 * GetRandomPercent) ; Generated random number between 0 and 99. Set nRandom to GetRandomPercent DamageActorValue Fatigue nDamage ; Makes tunnelers go berserk even on fellow tunnelers. If GetInFaction NVDLC04TunnelerFriendFaction && nRandom < 25 && GetAV BrainCondition > 0 ShowMessage NVDLC04TunnelerFrenzyMSG DamageAV BrainCondition 100 EndIf EndIf
; ######################################### ;Copied script for Zion Trail
; Makes V616 Ghouls go berserk even on fellow V616 Ghouls. If ( GetInFaction ZkbVault616Ghoul == 1 ) && ( GetDead == 0 )
If ( nRandom < 25 ) ShowMessage ZkbV616GhoulFrenzyMSG; SetAV Aggression 3; RemoveFromFaction ZkbVault616Ghoul; ResetAI; EndIf
EndIf ; #########################################
END

scn ZkbPondlurkSCRIPT
; activate pond lurk - initially disabled so they can't be shot from a distance
ref Pondlurk
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
Set Pondlurk to GetLinkedRef If Pondlurk.GetDead == 0 Pondlurk.Enable Endif
End
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player
Set Pondlurk to GetLinkedRef If Pondlurk.GetDead == 1 Disable MarkForDelete ; gets rid of activator elseif Pondlurk.IsInCombat == 0 Pondlurk.Disable Endif
End

scn ZkbBookSkillMeleeSCRIPT
Begin OnEquip
Player.ModActorValue MeleeWeapons 3 set p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.rBookUsed to ZkbBookSkillMelee Player.AddItem ZkbBookSkillMeleeMisc 1 1 ShowMessage ZkbBookSkillMeleeMsg
End

scn ZkbLilypadFieldMkSCRIPT
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
p20ZionTrailWaterFieldPathExitMapMarker.enable SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 20 ;ShowMessage ZkbTestMsg1 Disable MarkForDelete
End

scn ZkbRCBlinderTalkThiefSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
Player.RemoveAllItems ZkbRCJailBoxREF 1 1 ; removes players stuff, ouch! Set GameHour to GameHour + 1 ; adds an hour for a bit of realism ZkbRCJailBoxREF.lock 255 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack4sISFX ; Fade player in EnablePlayerControls ; restores player functionality ZkbPearsonBentREF.MoveTo ZkbJailBlinderMkREF ; Moves Bent to chair so he doesn't get into the cell ZkbPearsonBentREF.EVP ZkbBlinderPokeREF.MoveTo ZkbJailBlinderMkREF ; Readies Poke for conversation ZkbBlinderPokeREF.RemoveItem GlassesNCRRangerCivilian 1 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.EVP ; tidy up. Duplicated in ZkbBlinderTalkQA12 Topic if thief sequence bypassed ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.Disable ; Gets rid of companion warnings, no longer required ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.MarkForDelete ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.Disable ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.Disable ; removes trap switch for go to jail activator ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchAltREF.Enable ; replaces above trap switch with normal door switch ZkbRCThiefActREF.Disable ; Removes go to jail activator in utility tunnel ZkbRCThiefActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Enable ; Enables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Enable ZkbRCJailActREF.Disable ; Removes this activator as it is only needed once ZkbRCJailActREF.MarkForDelete
End

scn ZkbCrewNoteActSCRIPT
; Script to log which notes have been collected and run script on specific notes
Int ButtonVar Int NoteCount
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote01 == 1 && GetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 < 20 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbJDCrewQuest01 == 0 ; StartQuest ZkbJDCrewQuest01 ; Starts Quest running/edited out line 10-05-16 SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 20 ; activates quest ShowMap Route95GasStopREF ; Shows Gas Stop Location - For ZionTrail-NV.esp Player.additem ZkbKeyPetrolStn01 1 100 ; adds petrol stn key, forces this quest to start before entering zion trail Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote01 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote02 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote02 == 0 ; SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 20 ; Sets quest objectives, activates quest for player/moved line 10-05-16 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote02 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote03 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote03 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote03 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote04 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote04 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote04 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote05 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote05 == 0 ShowMap ZkbHayfordMapMkREF Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote05 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote06 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote06 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote06 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 If GetQuestRunning ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 ; Script to start V616 quest SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 20 Set ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote to 1 elseif GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 && ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote == 0 ; script to confirm confirm V616 rumours SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote07 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote07 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote07 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote08 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote08 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote08 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote09 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote09 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote09 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote10 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote10 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote10 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote11 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote11 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote11 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 If GetQuestRunning ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 ; Script to start V616 quest SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 20 Set ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote to 1 elseif GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 && ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote == 0 ; script to confirm confirm V616 rumours SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote12 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote12 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote12 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote13 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote13 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote13 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote14 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote14 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote14 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote15 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote15 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote15 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote16 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote16 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote16 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote17 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote17 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote17 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote18 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote18 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote18 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote19 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote19 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote19 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote20 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote20 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote20 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote21 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote21 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote21 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote22 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote22 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote22 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote23 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote23 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote23 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote24 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote24 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote24 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 If GetQuestRunning ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 ; Script to start V616 quest SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 20 Set ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote to 1 elseif GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 && ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote == 0 ; script to confirm confirm V616 rumours SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote25 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote25 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote25 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 If GetQuestRunning ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbVault616Quest01 == 0 ; Script to start V616 quest SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 20 Set ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote to 1 elseif GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 && ZkbVault616Quest01.V616QstJDNote == 0 ; script to confirm confirm V616 rumours SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote26 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote26 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote26 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote27 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote27 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote27 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote28 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote28 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote28 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote29 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote29 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote29 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote30 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote30 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote30 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote31 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote31 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote31 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote32 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote32 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote32 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote33 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote33 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote33 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote34 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote34 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote34 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote35 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote35 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote35 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote36 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote36 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote36 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote37 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote37 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote37 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote38 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote38 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote38 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote39 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote39 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote39 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote40 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote40 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote40 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote41 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote41 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote41 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote42 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote42 == 0 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote42 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
if GetHasNote ZkbCrewNote43 == 1 && ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote43 == 0 If ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal < 42 ShowMessage ZkbJDCrewEnd1Msg ; message to ask if player wants the quest to continue endif Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.CrewNote43 to 1 Set ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal + 1 Endif
Set NoteCount to ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal ; ShowMessage ZkbCrewNoteCountMsg NoteCount ; irratating pop up telling you how mant notes you have
If ZkbJDCrewQuest01.NoteTotal == 43 && GetQuestCompleted ZkbJDCrewQuest01 == 0 ShowMessage ZkbJDCrewEnd2Msg SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 100 Endif
End
; script to control button press on message
Begin GameMode
set buttonVar to getbuttonpressed if ButtonVar == -1 ; No button pressed Return elseif ButtonVar == 0 ; Carry on with quest SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 30 elseif ButtonVar == 1 ; Quit quest SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 90 endif RemoveMe
End

scn ZkbZionTrailMapSCRIPT
short doonce
Begin OnAdd
if doonce == 0 SetStage ZkbZionTrailQuest01 20 ShowMap Route95TunnelREF set doonce to 1 endif set p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap to 1
End

Scn ZkbZionTrailQuest01ActSCRIPT
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
SetStage ZkbZionTrailQuest01 100 ; Completes quest
ZkbZionTrailQuest01ActREF.Disable ; Removes this activator ZkbZionTrailQuest01ActREF.MarkForDelete
End

scn p20ZionTrailGenericQuestScript
short bTraveledToZionViaTrail short bTraveledToZionViaPassage short bHasMap short bRevealedZionRoadLocation short bCaravanIsntGhosting ref rBookUsed short bArrivedWithoutCaravan short bPlayerInPlayerFaction
begin gamemode
if getquestcompleted NVDLC02MQ06 == 1 || getquestcompleted NVDLC02MQ07 == 1 p20ZionTrailPostZionExitActRef1.enable p20ZionTrailPostZionExitActRef2.enable endif
if bRevealedZionRoadLocation == 0 && player.getinworldspace ZionTrail == 1 showmap p20ZionTrailEntrZionNatParkMapMarker set bRevealedZionRoadLocation to 1 endif
if bCaravanIsntGhosting == 0 && GetInCellParam NorthernPassageINT PlayerRef == 1
SetEssential NVDLC02HappyTrailsCaravanGuardAF 0 SetEssential NVDLC02HappyTrailsCaravanGuardCM 0 SetEssential NVDLC02HappyTrailsCaravanGuardCM2 0 SetEssential NVDLC02Jed 0 SetEssential NVDLC02Ricky 0 SetEssential NVDLC02Stella 0
NVDLC02GuardAFREF.SetGhost 0 NVDLC02GuardCMREF.SetGhost 0 NVDLC02JedREF.SetGhost 0 NVDLC02RickyREF.SetGhost 0 NVDLC02StellaREF.SetGhost 0
set bCaravanIsntGhosting to 1
endif
if bPlayerInPlayerFaction == 0 Player.AddToFaction NVDLC02PlayerFaction 1 set bPlayerInPlayerFaction to 1 endif
end
begin menumode 1001
if rBookUsed != 0 incrementscriptedchallenge p20ZionTrailChallengeBooks player.removeitem rBookUsed 1 set rBookUsed to 0 endif
end

scn p20ZionTrailDoorToTrailSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) if p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap == 0 ShowMessage p20ZionTrailNoMapMsg if getstage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 < 5 setstage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 5 endif Else Activate EndIf Else Return EndIf
END

ScriptName p20ZionTrailInvisibleDoorPassageToTrailSCRIPT
Ref rVCountryRadio; ; Variable to hold ref of NV's country radio. Short bActivateDoor; ; Used to determine whether we want to activate the door or not.
BEGIN OnActivate
If IsActionRef Player == 0 Return endif
if p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap == 0 ShowMessage NVDLC02NoMapMsg ElseIf GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ04 == 1 || GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ05 == 1 ShowMessage p20ZionTrailNoGoingBackMsg Else If ( NVDLC02ZionToMojaveDoorREF.bNVRadiosOff == 1 ) ;RNVTARef.SetBroadcastState 1 RNVTARef.Enable RadioBlackMountainTAREF.Enable Set rVCountryRadio To NVDLC02CountryRadioMarkerREF.GetLinkedREF ;rVCountryRadio.SetBroadcastState 1 rVCountryRadio.Enable Set NVDLC02ZionToMojaveDoorREF.bNVRadiosOff To 0 EndIf
If GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ06 StartQuest NVDLC02Ending ElseIf GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MQ07 SetStage NVDLC02MQ07 100 CompleteQuest NVDLC02MQ07 StopQuest NVDLC02MQ07
Set bActivateDoor To 1 Else Set bActivateDoor To 1 EndIf
If GetQuestRunning NVDLC02MS02 SetStage NVDLC02MS02 255 Endif
If bActivateDoor == 1 ; Are we activating the door? ;sets date for arrival
if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 0 endif SetGameHour 336 if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 1 endif
if NVDLC02FollowersQuest.bFollowsChalkHired NVDLC02FireTriggerREF.Activate NVDLC02FollowsChalkREF 1 endif if NVDLC02FollowersQuest.bWakingCloudHired NVDLC02FireTriggerREF.Activate NVDLC02WakingCloudREF 1 endif
Activate EndIf ; -------------------------------- NV Quests Restart ---------------------------------- \/ ; 2/9/11 ETB - Shutting down all NCR/Legion Assassin's quests (Legion "Bad2" one was causing a framerate issue). If NVDLC02ZionToMojaveDoorREF.bNVQuestsRestarted == 0 If GetStage VEFR01LegionGood2CaesarsFavor < 255 StartQuest VEFR01LegionGood2CaesarsFavor EndIf If GetStage VEFR00LegionMix2CaesarsHire < 255 StartQuest VEFR00LegionMix2CaesarsHire EndIf ; These quest were stopped in script: "NVDLC02MQ00SCRIPT" StartQuest VEFR02LegionBad2CaesarsFoe
;StartQuest VEFR01NCRGood2EmergencyRadio ; [NOTE: This quest is NOT restarted (i.e. commented-out) on purpose (but included for tracking).] StartQuest VEFR00NCRMixed2LimitedAccess StartQuest VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted Set NVDLC02ZionToMojaveDoorREF.bNVQuestsRestarted to 1 Set NVDLC02MQ00.bNVQuestsDisabled to 0 StopQuest NVDLC02RainQuest Endif ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /\ EndIf
END

scn p20ZionTrailDoorToTrailPassageSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) if p20ZionTrailGenericQuest.bHasMap == 0 ShowMessage NVDLC02NoCaravanMsg Else Activate EndIf Else Activate EndIf
END

Scn p20ZionTrailPostZionExitActSCRIPT
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
showmessage p20ZionTrailPostZionExitMsg SetStage ZkbZionTrailQuest01 100
showmap p20ZionTrailExitToMojaveMapMarker 1 showmap p20ZionTrailRoute95ChkPointMapMarker 1 showmap p20ZionTrailExitToZionMapMarker 1 showmap p20ZionTrailEntrZionNatParkMapMarker 1
End

scn p20ZionTrailOnlyPlayerSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) Activate Else Return EndIf
END

scn p20ZionTrailDoddsGateForceOpenTriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass == 0 Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete endif
disable markfordelete
End

Pugilist's Guide: How To Cheat In The RIng
Sorry, but I'm not going on a scavenger hunt for you.
The choice is yours, of course, but you're not going to find a way back to the Mojave without our help.
The choice is yours, of course.
I'm not going to leave without offering to help. What can I do?
{referring to the parable of the good samaritan}You're a good neighbor to us. We all go through periods of darkness. In such times, we can turn to the Lord, but it's good to have friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: {referring to the parable of the good samaritan}

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daniel and I need Pre-War tools to help us navigate beyond Zion. Should we need to evacuate, these instruments will be vital to us.
Normally, we would have some of the Dead Horses or Sorrows look for them, but many Pre-War buildings in the valley are taboo. They won't go inside.
{referring to the parable of the good samaritan}You're a good neighbor to us. We all go through periods of darkness. In such times, we can turn to the Lord, but it's good to have friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: {referring to the parable of the good samaritan}

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daniel and I need Pre-War tools to help us navigate beyond Zion. Should we need to evacuate, these instruments will be vital to us.
Normally, we would have some of the Dead Horses or Sorrows look for them, but many Pre-War buildings in the valley are taboo. They won't go inside.
I came here with the Happy Trails Caravan Company to make contact with the New Canaanites.
Happy Trails. {quietly remembering}I remember. {small smile}They were good friends.
{darker}I have bad news for your employers. New Canaan was destroyed, its citizens scattered. All because of the White Legs. And Caesar, of course.
The White Legs want to join the Legion. Caesar's rite of passage is the destruction of the New Canaanites, almost assuredly because of me.
The good news is that we can help you find your way back. Daniel, one of the other New Canaanites, has made many maps of the region.
The bad news is that we can't help you right now. Not with everything that's going on.
New Canaan was destroyed, its citizens scattered. All because of the White Legs. And Caesar, of course.
The White Legs want to join the Legion. Caesar's rite of passage is the destruction of the New Canaanites, almost assuredly because of me.
What's all this about New Canaan?
Why did the White Legs attack my caravan?
They attack everyone who isn't a White Leg, especially caravans. They don't know how to survive on their own, so they have to raid.
But as for why they are here, they are trying to wipe us out. All of us.
They want to join Caesar's Legion, and they can only prove their worth by destroying the New Canaanites and everyone we shelter.
They attack everyone who isn't a White Leg, especially caravans. They don't know how to survive on their own, so they have to raid.
But as for why they are here, they are trying to wipe us out. All of us.
They want to join Caesar's Legion, and they can only prove their worth by destroying the New Canaanites and everyone we shelter.
Why did the White Legs attack me?
You make a persuasive argument. I'm in. I'll need my stuff back though.
Sure, I've written the details down for you as listening isn't your strong point. Come see me when you're done.

Set ZkbPokeQuest01.Thief to 2 ; Variable to control which packages run Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 ZkbRCJailDoorREF.Unlock ; Jail cell door ZkbRCShack06DoorInt.Unlock ; Sheriffs office int door ZkbBlinderPokeREF.AddItem GlassesNCRRangerCivilian 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.evp ZkbPearsonBentREF.evp ZkbRCJailBoxREF.unlock ZkbRCJailBoxREF.setownership
All right, I'll weed your garden and you cut me in on your 'Ground House' thing.
Sure, I've written the details down for you as listening isn't your strong point, come see me when you're done.

Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ; ZkbCave08Exit.Unlock ; cave door leading up to water field ; tidy up for unused thief sequence ZkbRCSheriffsDoorExtREF.Unlock ; Sheriffs office ext door ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.Disable ; Gets rid of companion warnings, no longer required ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.MarkForDelete ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.Disable ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.Disable ; removes trap switch for go to jail activator ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchAltREF.Enable ; replaces above trap switch with normal door switch ZkbRCThiefActREF.Disable ; Removes go to jail activator in utility tunnel ZkbRCThiefActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Enable ; Enables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Enable ZkbRCJailActREF.Disable ; Removes jail cell activator as it is no longer required ZkbRCJailActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCJailBoxREF.unlock ZkbRCJailBoxREF.setownership

Learn the fate of JD's expedition.
(Optional) Learn the story of the entire crew.
Search for signs of a previous expedition.
The constant turmoil of the wasteland has thickened your skin. You've gained +1 Endurance.

Jed Masterson has died.
Without his maps and mountaineering expertise, you will need to find another way to travel to Zion.
Without a map or a guide, you have no hope of finding your way to Zion Valley.

A member of the Happy Trails Caravan has died.
Without their maps and mountaineering expertise, you will need to find another way to travel to Zion.

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Melee Weapons skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Now you know not to punch blades to stop them.
Knife Fighting: How To Counter A Ranged Weapon

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Barter skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Buy high, and hopefully sell higher?

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Energy Weapons skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
And you can cook them at the same time!
Modern Weapons: How To Electrocute, Burn, or Maim Your Enemies

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Explosives skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Not as eco friendly as a fishing rod, but it's a bit late to worry about that now.
Fisherman's Guide: All The Uses Of Dynamite

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Guns skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
It you are going to shoot something, shoot it properly.
Ballistics Guide: Hunting With Machine Guns

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Lockpick skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
And it might improve your hair style as well.

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Medicine skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Now you know there are better ways to treat cuts and lacerations than with a red hot spoon.
The Complete Novice's Guide To Surgery

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Repair skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Does anyone else remember Blue Peter? Now THERE you could learn something.

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Science skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
You find it polite that they leave backdoors for you.
Programmer's Guide: Tricks And Backdoors In Military Programming

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Sneak skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
You feel like a zany little sneaky sleuthster! Whatever that means.

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Speech skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
So you can smell it, but can you dish it out?
Psychologist Periodical: How To Fix A Patient In 3 Easy Steps

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Survival skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
Is there nothing you can't learn in a Vault?

You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Unarmed skill has permanently increased by 3 points.
But, just because people think you can strangle a Yao Guai doesn't make trying it a good idea.
Pugilist's Guide: How To Cheat In The RIng
Without a map or a guide, you have no hope of finding your way back to the Mojave.

With your map you discern some ways to return to the Mojave. These have been marked on your Pip-Boy. Other entrances back into Zion Valley have also been marked on your map.
You can choose to walk the Zion Trail, or simply fast travel to one of the locations to the south of your map.
Read all Zion Trail skill books.
